General.Name: Helios Towers Plc
General.Description: Helios Towers plc, an independent tower company, acquires, builds, and operates telecommunications towers and passive infrastructure. It provides colocation lease-up, build-to-suit, sale and leaseback, in-building, small cells/outdoor distributed antenna system, and other managed services. The company also offers comprehensive tower-related operational services, including site selection, site preparation, maintenance, security, and power management. It operates a network of sites and tenancies in Tanzania, the Democratic Republic of Congo, Congo Brazzaville, Ghana, South Africa, Senegal, Malawi, and Madagascar. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 5 Merchant Square West, London, United Kingdom, W2 1AS
